name: places/ChIJzcI49eRYwokRumR7mFvJqN0
formattedAddress: 920 3rd Ave 6th Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 920 3rd Ave 6th Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classical Pilates studio offering mat, reformer & tower sessions in a relaxed environment.

originalText.text:
I recently had a truly terrible experience with Power Pilates in regards to their support and management. I received a thoughtful gift of a 5-pack of classes for Christmas, only to find out that they expire after just one month.

When I reached out to them via email, hoping for a little leniency to redeem the classes within this month, I was met with a disappointing response. Despite going back and forth with their customer support, the office flat out refused to offer any kind of first-time grace period. The only way they were willing to let me use the expired classes was if I paid a fee of $30 plus tax.

As a fellow business owner, I am appalled by their lack of understanding and flexibility in this situation. It goes against basic business principles and reflects poorly on their practices. This is definitely not how you retain customers.

Needless to say, I am incredibly frustrated and deeply unhappy with Power Pilates. I strongly advise anyone reading this to take their business elsewhere. It's evident that this company is solely interested in your money and lacks any form of customer-centric approach.

Find a pilates studio that values its customers and treats them with respect. Power Pilates is not the place you want to invest your time and money.

originalText.text: I love this studio so much! Their open mat, tower, and reformer classes are all great. I take classes with Pedro and he’s such a fun, knowledgeable, and skilled instructor. He’s really helped my Pilates form and overall strength. The small class sizes and calm vibe help me stay motivated to come to the studio often.

text.text: I love this studio so much! Their open mat, tower, and reformer classes are all great. I take classes with Pedro and he’s such a fun, knowledgeable, and skilled instructor. He’s really helped my Pilates form and overall strength. The small class sizes and calm vibe help me stay motivated to come to the studio often.

originalText.text: My argument with Power Pilates on 3rd Avenue is financial.  I purchased a promotional package for three sessions.  When I cancelled one session within 23 hours my money and the package was taken away.  I think this is harsh for a first timer.  I used every argument I could think of with Jenna the Studio Development Manager to no avail (even the fact that I was planning to continue working with Pedro!).  Being a tough disciplinarian may be useful in some professions but I feel is inappropriate in a place of healing.

originalText.text:
I LOVE this studio! Pedro the instructor and the staff are so well versed and educated in Pilates. They know how to elevate your workout routine as well as extremely fun and helpful!

It’s the base point of my exercise, along with weights at the gym, now! Highly recommend a membership ❣️

originalText.text: After taking Dani’s mat Pilates class virtually many times during the pandemic I was happy to finally take her class in person! It is a great workout either way but what makes her class better than anyone else’s is because her positivity and energy just radiates! She helps to not only get you physically stronger but she makes you FEEL strong!
